Huntress: Do you know why people leave flowers at their loved ones graves?
They say that as they decay here, [color=yellow]flowers reach those on the other side[color=white].
One moment, you are the happiest person alive. On the next, what you hold dear gets taken away by the wind.
Death: Thought you'd never see me again, did you? Did you believe you threw you past away?
Look at you. A colorless husk.
I have decided to make you mortal. Maybe you will learn something important.
DeathEnd: You're finally here, I've been waiting...
I hope you're ready for this.
DeathDefeated: You have shown your strengh so I shall grant you a choice...
You can take back your immortality, and continue to live forever...
Or you can keep your mortality and live until you reach the end of your journey.
Do the rays that escape the grasp of the leaves hold gold in your eyes? Or are they empty?
Choose wisely, there is no turning back.
Kind Goblin Merchant: Well, I’ll give you some advice, free of charge!
[color=yellow]Search where the sun illuminates your path [color=white]and you might just find something valuable.
You can see what you've collected so far by  going to the Menu and selecting 'Upgrades'.
Move along now, have a business to run here.
Brotherly Goblin Merchant: You must have met my brother on your way here. There are three of us, actually.
I see you don’t have any money…
[color=yellow]Keep an eye out for crystals[color=white] on the cave up ahead. They hide valuable loot.
Wise Goblin Merchant: All this time and you still have no money?!
I guess I’ll give you some advice, then. Listen closely.
It’s very likely you’ll confront your past up ahead.
They say Death can't be hurt, [color=yellow]at least in the world of the living.[color=white]
[color=yellow]You'll need the courage [color=white]to defeat it at its own game.
Remember that and you will be fine.
Old Samurai: Hey there, here's a piece of advice from an old men.
Life can be quite short, so live to the fullest, so that on the day you die, you die with a smile on your face.
I say this, but I will not be be able to.
I've comitted sins that can't be forgiven.
Still, sometimes I dream of that faraway dream.
Villager: That merchant up ahead is rather friendly and gives the best advice.
But don’t be fooled, most goblins are actually vile creatures. Don’t feel bad for killing them!
Although you don’t look like you would…
